lead_paragraph: KLEBANOFF--Michael, 95 years old, died on March 11, 2016 with his family by his side. He is survived by his loving, devoted wife Angelica of 67 years, two adoring children Karyn and Sandra, and three beautiful grandchildren Erika, Corinne and David. He was a man among men. A husband who cherished his wife, a father who adored his children, a friend who always found time to advise and help others, and a businessman governed by integrity, honesty and ethical values. A rare human being who could teach humanity some lessons. He is, and will always be, missed and loved by all who knew him. 1/3
